lead_paragraph: An agreement to allow the delivery of humanitarian aid offers at least a glimmer of hope after the relentless attacks by Russia in support of the Syrian regime.

headline.print_headline: A Chance to Halt the Brutality in Syria
headline.main: A Chance to Halt the Brutality in Syria

snippet: An agreement to allow the delivery of humanitarian aid offers at least a glimmer of hope after the relentless attacks by Russia in support of the Syrian regime.
abstract: Editorial expresses hope agreement reached between United States and Russia to deliver aid to Syrian cities and implement cease-fire there may provide relief to population besieged by Russian attacks for months; warns continued relief and eventual peace will require Russian Pres Vladimir Putin and Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad  to abide by terms of deal, uncertain prospect given duplicity and ambition demonstrated by both leaders.
